description: A defense mechanism that allows for information flow control .

external_references.description: Authentication-based defense mechanism for test-time indirect prompt injection attacks, where incoming prompts are authenticated against a cryptographic signature to ensure they align with trusted inputs. By validating prompt integrity at runtime, FATH effectively mitigates the risk of adversarial modifications influencing the model's outputs.

Injection Attacks
